sentences.en: A unit of apothecary weight, equal to 480 grains ( 31.10 grams ).
sentences.cn: 盎司药衡重量单位, 等于480格令 ( 31.10克 )

sentences.en: Apothecary Grick at the Apothecary Camp wants you to bring him 12 Deranged Explorer Brains.
sentences.cn: 药剂师营地旳药剂师格里克要伱给他带来12个疯狂探索者大脑.

sentences.en: Apothecary My poverty, but not my will, consents.
sentences.cn: 药剂师是我的贫穷同意了你, 但不是我的意愿.

sentences.en: Apothecary Society Messenger says: For the Banshee Queen!
sentences.cn: 药剂师协会信使: 为了女妖皇后!
药剂师谁这样高声喊叫?

sentences.en: Apothecary: The availability of medicines makes the isle more orderly.
sentences.cn: 药店: 有效的药品让岛上的人们感到有次序.

sentences.en: Does anyone even know what an apothecary is?
sentences.cn: 有谁知道药师是 什么 ?

sentences.en: H is an Herb Shop, a native apothecary or Chinese druggist.
sentences.cn: 是中草药铺, 就是天然草药商或是中药商.

sentences.en: He was the usual cut and dry apothecary, of no particular age and color.
sentences.cn: 他是那种再普通不过的行医者, 说不出多大年纪,相貌也没什么值得一提的.

sentences.en: I am an apothecary of that hospital.
sentences.cn: 我是那家医院的一名药剂师.

sentences.en: Mrs. Lovett: She poisoned herself. Arsenic from the apothecary around the corner… and he's got your daughter.
sentences.cn: 洛薇特夫人：她服毒自尽了，是从街拐角的药剂师那里得到的砒霜……他接管了你的女儿。

sentences.en: Peter is a famous apothecary of this town.
sentences.cn: 彼得是这个镇上有名的药剂师.

sentences.en: The Apothecary in Diagon Alley is where many witches and wizards buy their potion - making supplies.
sentences.cn: 很多男女巫师都在对角巷的药店里买他们的魔药制作原料.

sentences.en: Yellow apothecary: Like, it is to like too simply!
sentences.cn: 黄药师: 喜欢啊, 简直是太喜欢了!

sentences.en: You can consult apothecary, they can tell you accurate result.
sentences.cn: 你可以去请教药剂师, 他们会告诉你准确答案的.

trans.tran_en: someone who mixed and sold medicines in the past
